output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(visNetwork)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
nodes <- responses_test %>% 
  select(id) %>% 
  mutate(group = id)
edges <- responses_test %>% 
  mutate(from = id) %>%
  mutate(to = sports) %>%
  select(from, to)

visNetwork(nodes, edges) %>% 
  visGroups(groupname = "id", color = "darkblue", shape = "square", size = 65)
```

```{r}
table(responses_test$most_connected)
```
